name: relogdivd

comment: The natural logarithm of the quotient of two positive real numbers is the difference of natural logarithms. Exercise 72(a) and Property 3 of [Cohen] p. 301, restricted to natural logarithms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
